content: Mengapa saya tidak bisa memilih apotek untuk membeli obat? Saya beli 2 obat berbeda, namun ternyata obat satunya kosong dan akibatnya saya ganti dengan merk yg lain. Apotekernya bilang tidak ada perbedaan spesifik (dimana menurut saya tidak masalah, namun bagaimana kalau ada perbedaan dosis dsb?) Dan klaim dari apoteker harganya sama, namun saat saya cek harganya berbeda (walaupun tidak jauh berbeda di case saya, namun bagaimana dengan customer lain yg mendapatkan harga berbeda?)

Dan klaim dari apoteker harganya sama, namun saat saya cek harganya berbeda (walaupun tidak jauh berbeda di case saya, namun bagaimana dengan customer lain yg mendapatkan harga berbeda?)
content_translated: Why can't I choose a pharmacy to buy medicine? I bought 2 different drugs, but apparently the only drug was empty and as a result I replace it with another brand. The pharmacist says there is no specific difference (where in my opinion it doesn't matter, but what if there are differences in doses, etc.) and claims from the pharmacist are the same price, but when I check the price is different (although not much different in my case, but what about other customers who are get different prices?)

content: Pesan obat buat anak yang sedang sakit, berharap 1 jam kemudian bisa diterima, kenyataan peranannya dibatalkan sampai 3x, 2x oleh apotik, 1x oleh driver. Sampai pada akhirnya anak saya ketiduran, padahal rencananya mau minum obat sebelum tidur. Awal pesan adalah jam 7pm, pesanan ke 4, sudah jam 10 pm. Akhirnya datang sebelum jam 11. Saya bingung kenapa apotik dan driver butuh waktu lama untuk batalkan pesanan. Rata2 butuh 1 jam buat batalkan pesanan. Sadarkah mereka sedang melayani orang sakit?

content_translated: Order medicine for children who are sick, hope 1 hour later can be received, the reality of its role is canceled up to 3x, 2x by the pharmacy, 1x by the driver. Until finally my child fell asleep, even though his plan was to take medicine before going to sleep. The beginning of the message is 7pm, the 4th order, it's 10 pm. Finally came before 11 o'clock. I was confused why pharmacies and drivers took a long time to cancel the order. The average takes 1 hour to cancel the order. Are they aware that they are serving sick people?

content: Saya booked test PCR Drive thru (Same Day) di RS Meilia, Cibubur tgl 2 Feb 2022 jam 9 pagi. Sebelum test dijanjikan petugas RS hasilnya bisa diterima malam harinya/paling lambat keesokan paginya. Tapi faktanya hasil test baru keluar besoknya tgl 3 Feb jam 16.00 jauh melebihi 1x24 jam bahkan. Itupun baru 2 dari 3 hasil test yang keluar, 1 lagi belum s/d saya tulis review ini jam 18.00. Entah apa kendalanya, RS & Halodoc cuma bisa suruh nunggu. Kualitas layanan yang pantas diganjar bintang 1.
content_contractions: Saya booked test PCR Drive thru (Same Day) di RS Meilia, Cibubur tgl 2 Feb 2022 jam 9 pagi. Sebelum test dijanjikan petugas RS hasilnya bisa diterima malam harinya/paling lambat keesokan paginya. Tapi faktanya hasil test baru keluar besoknya tgl 3 Feb jam 16.00 jauh melebihi 1x24 jam bahkan. Itupun baru 2 dari 3 hasil test yang keluar, 1 lagi belum s/d saya tulis review ini jam 18.00. Entah apa kendalanya, RS & Halodoc cuma bisa suruh nunggu. Kualitas layanan yang pantas diganjar bintang 1.
content_translated: I booked the PCR Drive Thru (Same Day) test at Meilia Hospital, Cibubur on 2 Feb 2022 at 9 am. Before the test was promised the hospital officer the results could be received at night/no later than the next morning. But the fact is that the new test results came out the next day on 3 Feb at 16.00 far exceeding 1x24 hours even. Even then, only 2 of the 3 test results that came out, 1 more I have not written this review at 18:00. I don't know what the obstacles are, RS & Halodoc can only be told to wait. Quality of services that deserve to be rewarded with 1 star.
